sentences.sContent: During the first stage of wound healing, inflammation around the damaged area stimulates the production of a substance called collagen.
sentences.sContent_eng: During the first stage of wound healing, inflammation around the damaged area stimulates the production of a substance called collagen.
sentences.sCn: 伤口愈合的第一个阶段，受损区域的炎症反应刺激一种叫做胶原蛋白的物质生成。

trans.tranOther: a  protein  found in people and animals. It is often used in beauty products and treatments to make people look younger and more attractive.
